gymnast.title: Create New Gymnast
gymnast.description: Register a gymnast who is not yet in the FIG database

validation.invalidFigId: Please enter a valid FIG ID
validation.figIdMinLength: FIG ID must be at least 3 characters
validation.firstNameMinLength: First name must be at least 2 characters
validation.lastNameMinLength: Last name must be at least 2 characters
validation.ageRange: Age must be between 9 and 50 years
validation.figIdExists: A gymnast with this FIG ID already exists
validation.invalidImageType: Invalid image format. Please upload a JPEG, PNG, or GIF file.
validation.imageTooLarge: Image size must be less than 5MB

labels.imageHelp: Upload a profile image (JPEG, PNG, or GIF, max 5MB)

licenseNotice.title: License Status Notice
licenseNotice.description: Local gymnasts are marked as "license to check" by default. Please verify their FIG registration status before the tournament.

success.createdDescription: {name} has been added to your country's gymnast list with "license to check" status.

errors.createFailedDescription: Please check your input and try again.
errors.imageUploadFailedDescription: The gymnast was created but the image upload failed. You can try uploading the image again later.

coach.description: Register a coach for this tournament

judge.title: Add Judge
judge.description: Register a judge for this tournament

support.title: Add Support Staff
support.description: Register support staff for this tournament
